Best Features of WhatsLov
â— Share cute emoji smileys, emoji stickers and best GIFs for free!

â— Great stickers for WhatsApp, Facebook, Messenger, Telegram, WeChat, Snapchat, IMO, Viber, Instagram, Line and also by e-mail and MMS...
â— No keyboard installation required. Send as stickers. Tap directly to share. 

â— You can find some secrets to win points and compete with other players 
â— Customize your own background colors by swiping a finger.

Because our emoji are not preloaded on all devices, they need to be sent as images to ensure they can be sent and received by everyone. So, our smileys are sent as MMS (MMS pics) and not as SMS.
